ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hello...I am new here....yes...yes I am
ygData.msgSnippet: ... for 46/47 to 50 do bloodgills in LOIO ... i did 48/49 in one day, but after that day it was really good to see the sun again ... ;-) maybe you should also
ygData.messageBody:
Sean O'Connor wrote:

> What server are you on? Mr. lvl 32 mage and If i may suggest find a
> decent group inside of Dalnir to go up a few level, once you hit 34 or
> so go to Iceclad, then after 39 porgress to Eastern wastes Id say fight
> there till 44 you can do IC and EW solo or in a group, Im a lvl 42 mage


for 46/47 to 50 do bloodgills in LOIO ... i did 48/49 in one day, but

after that day it was really good to see the sun again ... ;-)

maybe you should also check with "The Magician's Tower" at

http://pub6.ezboard.com/bthemagicianstower

IMHO this is a must for mages.



Biltilie Dwimmerlaik
level 53 female gnome magician
Tarew Marr
